price: (28) Oh, woe to me! I wish I had not taken that one[1019] as a friend.
arabic: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yāwaylatā laytanī lam attakhidh fulānan khalīlan
